snippet: Chevron has spent millions in recent years trying to shore up its relationship with Richmond, Calif., but many residents still oppose the company’s efforts to repair a refinery hit by a fire.
abstract: Chevron has spent millions in recent years trying to shore up its relationship with Richmond, Calif, but many residents still oppose company’s efforts to repair refinery hit by fire in August 2012.
lead_paragraph: Chevron has spent millions in recent years trying to shore up its relationship with Richmond, Calif., but many residents still oppose the company’s efforts to repair a refinery hit by a fire.

headline.seo: Chevron Hits Rough Patch in Richmond, Calif.
headline.main: Together a Century, City and Oil Giant Hit a Rough Patch
headline.print_headline: Together a Century, City and Oil Giant Hit a Rough Patch
